Borrower Risk Warning

Important information about your responsibilities and risks associated with credit deals.

  • You ( ) are responsible for managing your credit deals and repaying them in a timely manner, noone else. Consider using an automatic repayment method to avoid missing the repayment deadline if you might forget the deadline.
  • Be aware of your exposure to external volatilities during the credit deal repay period; the value of your borrowed assets and your backing collateral will fluctuate, you should consider such volatility exposure when deciding on how/when you'll repay the credit deal.
  • Failure to repay a credit deal will result in the loss of remaining backing collateral assets. There isn't a credit score system which punishes defaulting borrowers; the agreed terms of the credit deal will be honoured.
